languages.text: Проктор Антар запрашивает разрешение на высадку с отрядом: по его данным, в окрестностях поселения может находиться убежище контрабандистов. Нелегальные перевозки едва ли интересуют проктора, но преступники были уличены в нападении на конвой Арбитес — выжившие в той стычке еретики да узнают: от правосудия невозможно скрыться.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Проктор Антар запрашивает разрешение на высадку с отрядом: этот неприметный объект подозревается в контрабанде "императорской водки" — запрещенного наркотика на основе психоактивных веществ токсичной личинки диамфидии.

languages.text: Proctor Anthar requests permission to land with a squad: according to his intelligence, there may be a smugglers' hideout in the vicinity of the settlement. Illegal transports are of little interest to the Proctor, but the criminals have been caught in an attack on an Arbites convoy — the heretics who survived that skirmish will soon learn that there is no escaping justice.
languages.original_text: Проктор Антар запрашивает разрешение на высадку с отрядом: по его данным, в окрестностях поселения может находиться убежище контрабандистов. languages.text: Proktor Anthar bittet um Erlaubnis, mit einem Trupp zu landen: Laut seinen Informationen soll sich ein Versteck von Schmugglern in der Nähe der Ansiedlung befinden. Illegale Transport interessieren den Proktor nur wenig, aber die Verbrecher haben auch einen Konvoi der Arbites überfallen – die Ketzer, die dieses Gefecht überlebt haben, werden bald erfahren, dass sie der Gerechtigkeit nicht entkommen können.

Illegal transports are of little interest to the Proctor, but the criminals have been caught in an attack on an Arbites convoy — the heretics who survived that skirmish will soon learn that there is no escaping justice.

Illegale Transport interessieren den Proktor nur wenig, aber die Verbrecher haben auch einen Konvoi der Arbites überfallen – die Ketzer, die dieses Gefecht überlebt haben, werden bald erfahren, dass sie der Gerechtigkeit nicht entkommen können.

languages.text: Le proctor Anthar vous demande l'autorisation d'atterrir avec son escouade. D'après ses sources, des contrebandiers pourraient se dissimuler à proximité du village. D'ordinaire, le proctor ne s'intéresse guère à la contrebande de marchandises, mais ces criminels ont récemment attaqué un convoi de l'Arbites. Les rares survivants à cette escarmouche découvriront bientôt qu'il est impossible d'échapper à la justice.
languages.original_text: Proctor Anthar requests permission to land with a squad: according to his intelligence, there may be a smugglers' hideout in the vicinity of the settlement. Illegal transports are of little interest to the Proctor, but the criminals have been caught in an attack on an Arbites convoy — the heretics who survived that skirmish will soon learn that there is no escaping justice.

D'ordinaire, le proctor ne s'intéresse guère à la contrebande de marchandises, mais ces criminels ont récemment attaqué un convoi de l'Arbites. Les rares survivants à cette escarmouche découvriront bientôt qu'il est impossible d'échapper à la justice.

languages.text: 安萨监察官请求允许带领小队前往行星表面进行调查。根据他的情报，定居点附近可能隐藏着走私犯的窝点。监察官对非法运输行为不感兴趣，但那些走私犯曾袭击过法务部的车队，双方发生了激烈交火。幸存下来的异端分子很快就会意识到，没人能逃脱正义的审判。
languages.original_text: Proctor Anthar requests permission to land with a squad: according to his intelligence, there may be a smugglers' hideout in the vicinity of the settlement. Illegal transports are of little interest to the Proctor, but the criminals have been caught in an attack on an Arbites convoy — the heretics who survived that skirmish will soon learn that there is no escaping justice.

traits.locale_text: 安萨监察官请求允许带领小队前往行星表面进行调查。根据他的情报，定居点附近可能隐藏着走私犯的窝点。监察官对非法运输行为不感兴趣，但那些走私犯曾袭击过法务部的车队，双方发生了激烈交火。幸存下来的异端分子很快就会意识到，没人能逃脱正义的审判。

languages.text: El Procurador Anthar solicita permiso para aterrizar con una unidad. Según informes de inteligencia que ha recibido, es posible que haya un escondite de contrabandistas en las inmediaciones del asentamiento. Los transportes ilegales no interesan al Procurador, pero los criminales han participado en un ataque a un convoy del Arbites. Los herejes que sobrevivieron pronto descubrirán que la justicia es ineludible.
languages.original_text: Proctor Anthar requests permission to land with a squad: according to his intelligence, there may be a smugglers' hideout in the vicinity of the settlement. Illegal transports are of little interest to the Proctor, but the criminals have been caught in an attack on an Arbites convoy — the heretics who survived that skirmish will soon learn that there is no escaping justice.

traits.locale_text: El Procurador Anthar solicita permiso para aterrizar con una unidad. Según informes de inteligencia que ha recibido, es posible que haya un escondite de contrabandistas en las inmediaciones del asentamiento. Los transportes ilegales no interesan al Procurador, pero los criminales han participado en un ataque a un convoy del Arbites. Los herejes que sobrevivieron pronto descubrirán que la justicia es ineludible.

languages.text: アンサール代理人が部隊と共に着陸する許可を求めた。彼の情報によると、居住地の近くに密輸業者の隠れ家があるかもしれない。違法輸送自体は代理人にとってさほど興味のあることではないが、犯罪者たちは高等裁定局の護衛隊への攻撃で捕まった。その小競り合いを生き延びた異端者たちは、正義から逃れられないということを直ぐに思い知るだろう。
languages.original_text: Proctor Anthar requests permission to land with a squad: according to his intelligence, there may be a smugglers' hideout in the vicinity of the settlement. Illegal transports are of little interest to the Proctor, but the criminals have been caught in an attack on an Arbites convoy — the heretics who survived that skirmish will soon learn that there is no escaping justice.

traits.locale_text: アンサール代理人が部隊と共に着陸する許可を求めた。彼の情報によると、居住地の近くに密輸業者の隠れ家があるかもしれない。違法輸送自体は代理人にとってさほど興味のあることではないが、犯罪者たちは高等裁定局の護衛隊への攻撃で捕まった。その小競り合いを生き延びた異端者たちは、正義から逃れられないということを直ぐに思い知るだろう。

languages.text: Üsteğmen Anthar, yanında bir manga ile iniş izni talep ediyor. İstihbaratına göre yerleşim civarında bir kaçakçı sığınağı olabilirmiş. Gayrimeşru sevkiyatlar Üsteğmen'i pek ilgilendirmiyor fakat bu suçlular, bir Arbites konvoyuna saldırırken yakalanmış. O çarpışmadan sağ kurtulan kâfirler, adaletten kaçış olmadığını yakında öğrenecek.
languages.original_text: Proctor Anthar requests permission to land with a squad: according to his intelligence, there may be a smugglers' hideout in the vicinity of the settlement. Illegal transports are of little interest to the Proctor, but the criminals have been caught in an attack on an Arbites convoy — the heretics who survived that skirmish will soon learn that there is no escaping justice.

traits.locale_text: Üsteğmen Anthar, yanında bir manga ile iniş izni talep ediyor. İstihbaratına göre yerleşim civarında bir kaçakçı sığınağı bulunabilir. Gayrimeşru sevkiyatlar Üsteğmen'i pek ilgilendirmiyor fakat bu suçlular, bir Arbites konvoyuna saldırırken yakalanmışlardır. O çarpışmadan sağ kurtulan kâfirler, adaletten kaçış olmadığını yakında öğrenecektir.
